text: Lonesome Luke Leans to the Literary is a 1916 American short comedy film featuring Harold Lloyd. ==Plot== Lonesome Luke (Harold Lloyd) tries to sell books to a businessman and his wife. ==Cast== * Harold Lloyd - Lonesome Luke * Snub Pollard - (as Harry Pollard) * Gene Marsh * Bebe Daniels ==See also== * Harold Lloyd filmography ==References== ==External links== * Category:1916 films Category:1916 comedy films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1916 short films Category:American silent short films Category:Films directed by Hal Roach Category:Lonesome Luke films Category:Comedy short films
title: Lonesome Luke Leans to the Literary
